title: Smartwatch global unit sales forecast 2014 to 2015
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 7 lines namely Western Europe, Asia Pacific, North America, Central and Eastern Europe, China, South America, and Middle East and Africa. The y axis represents SOME LABEL and the x axis represents Year.

Overall Asia Pacific, and North America are rapidly increasing, Western Europe, Central and Eastern Europe, China, South America, and Middle East and Africa are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, North America mostly maintained the highest SOME LABEL when compared to others with a mean value of 4.3, and it peaked at 2015.
Followed by Asia Pacific which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 3.9 SOME LABEL,reaching its highest point  at 2015 with a value of 6.7.
The botommost line, South America,  has a mean of 0.35, and peaked at 2015.
South America reported the lowest SOME LABEL about 0.1 in Year 2014
Asia Pacific, and North America has increased by 6.7, and 6.2 times respectively.
